title: Mini studio in the heart of Silicon Valley
shortDescription: Great location: 8 mins walk to downtown, 9 mins walk to Caltrain/VTA/Company shuttles. We pay special attention to the cleanliness so you can enjoy. Great for short stays, pleasure, business trip and apartment hunt.

title: Walk Dwntwn Organic Home
shortDescription: You would stay in our quiet, private, bedrooms one with a queen bed. The room has a window and closet space and there are hardwood and bamboo floors throughout the house. The beds are super comfortable and have really nice linens.

title: Stylish, Light-filled Cottage
shortDescription: Eat breakfast on the secluded patio garden at a cozy studio in charming San Jose. Indulge in a relaxing soak in the all-white bathroom, unwind with a book in an antique chair under the sash window, or snuggle up in the carved wooden bed by the fire.
